## More articles by The DRG (A Cortico

what_you_do: Consultant, keynote speaker, instructor, and leadership coach specializing in professional networking strategies for 20+ years.
who_you_serve: Clients in a variety of industries, such as accounting, architecture, law firms, higher ed, and more.
social_proof: Considered a pioneer in social networking, McGraw-Hill commissioned me to write the definitive book on networking in 2003 (before Facebook or LinkedIn) called The Networking Survival Guide. It went into a 2nd printing just 90 days after the book hit the shelves. Collectively my books have been translated into 9 languages.
signature_programs: The Networking Survival Guide, Networking for Career Success
business_focus: Specializing in professional networking strategies for individual career development and broader business performance.
service_provided: virtual and in-person speaking engagements, one-on-one leadership coaching, strategic consulting
